Literature.Title: Study on the Structure-Activity Relationship of an Antimicrobial Peptide, Brevinin-2GUb, from the Skin Secretion of Hylarana guentheri.
Literature.Author: Lin Y, Liu S, Xi X, Ma C, Wang L, Chen X, Shi Z, Chen T, Shaw C, Zhou M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=6506 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=572.6 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MBC=32µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=2µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=256µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MFC=256µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=64µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=256µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=256µM),Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-2340(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-2340(MBC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa B004 V2S2B(MIC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa B004 V2S2B(MBC=64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC=128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MBC=128µM)
